```py
>>> a = np.ma.arange(9).reshape((3, 3))
>>> a[1, 0] = np.ma.masked
>>> a[1, 2] = np.ma.masked
>>> a[2, 1] = np.ma.masked
>>> a
masked_array(
 data=[[0, 1, 2],
 [--, 4, --],
 [6, --, 8]],
 mask=[[False, False, False],
 [ True, False,  True],
 [False,  True, False]],
 fill_value=999999)
>>> for index, x in np.ma.ndenumerate(a):
...     print(index, x)
(0, 0) 0
(0, 1) 1
(0, 2) 2
(1, 1) 4
(2, 0) 6
(2, 2) 8 
```

```py
>>> for index, x in np.ma.ndenumerate(a, compressed=False):
...     print(index, x)
(0, 0) 0
(0, 1) 1
(0, 2) 2
(1, 0) --
(1, 1) 4
(1, 2) --
(2, 0) 6
(2, 1) --
(2, 2) 8 
```
